title: GitHub Copilot is now available for free
author: ksec
aiHeadline: Breaking News: GitHub Copilot is Now Free, Because Who Needs Human Programmers Anymore, and You Can Finally Automate All the Coding Tasks You've Been Procrastinating On for Years, Rejoice!

title: 1-800-ChatGPT
author: yzydserd
aiHeadline: 1-800-ChatGPT: Because Talking to a Robot on the Phone is the Future of Human Interaction, and You'll Never Have to Deal with Another Awkward Conversation with a Real Person Again, Thanks OpenAI!

title: Silver amulet is the oldest evidence of Christianity north of the Alps
author: secretmark
aiHeadline: Archaeologists Stunned to Discover Ancient Silver Amulet, the Oldest Evidence of Christianity North of the Alps, Which is Pretty Cool, But Let's be Real, It's No Holy Grail, and We're Still Waiting for Someone to Find the Lost City of Atlantis or Something

title: The unbearable slowness of being: Why do we live at 10 bits/s?
author: sebg
aiHeadline: Scientists Baffled by the Unbearable Slowness of Human Existence, Wondering Why We're Stuck at a Pace of 10 Bits Per Second, Which is Basically Like Watching Paint Dry, and They're Trying to Figure Out How to Speed Us Up, Hopefully to Something More Exciting, Like 4K Resolution or Something

title: Updates to H-1B
author: sul_tasto
aiHeadline: US Government Updates H-1B Visa Rules, Allowing Employers to Fill Critical Jobs Faster, Which is Great News for Tech Companies, But Let's Not Forget the Human Cost of Importing More Highly Skilled Workers, and the Potential for Increased Coffee Consumption in the Office, Because, You Know, More Coders Means More Coffee
